channel.title: Full RS2 Server Hacked From Jagex! Download it Here!
channel.description:
OFLINE. DEDICATED SERVER WAS HACKED AND I AM TRYING MY BEST TO GET IT BACK UP.
[CENTER] [b][i]The reason I'm making this thread is because I do NOT have a server on the status page yet it tells me I cannot make another one because I have one already. If this thread is locked/deleted please also remove my IP so I can post it on the status page.[/i][/b] [IMG]http://img520.imageshack.us/img520/1772/bsbanner1vr6hs3.png[/img] [size=14pt][b][url=http://battlescapeisle.invisionzone.com]BattleScape Forums[/url][/b][/size] [URL=http://battlescapeisle.invisionzone.com/index2.php]Highscores[/URL]
[B][u]Owner[/u][/B] Palidino76 [B][u]Moderators[/u][/B] X Ic3 F1st X xxx sp3x xxx Lusidea Kay Oh [B][u]Forum Moderators[/u][/B] Liam
Once you have signed up at the forums your account will be created for use on the server. Largely populated server with skills, amazing pking, awesome minigames, and much more!

item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“Palidino67, post:32, topic:190708”][quote author=zoltanman link=topic=254234.msg2121999#msg2121999 date=1205995752]

All the admins of pk isle x had dedicated server access, allowing it to be easily released if any of them wanted to. Ben’s was released because he gave someone the login details to his dedicated (don’t ask me why the hell he would do that). I won’t make admins let alone give someone my dedicated’s password rofl, and I’m the only one who works on this server so no one else has access to it because of being part of the dev team.

Also, no matter what IP I use on the server status page it says I already have one even though I don’t.

This server has been around since august, I just hate mopar because I was IP banned unfairly (I guess it finally got lifted).

And people saying this looks familiar - post proof or fuck off nerds

I gave a dedicated access to somebody I’ve known for over two years. But, you can’t trust anybody but yourself on the internet.
[/quote]
Ya thats the sad truth. Anyway you say it might be because Im banned from the status page? I’ve never posted anything bad on it.[/quote]

I had to get un-named to remove mine from the status page :.

Read full topic
